about_the_game:
House Designer 2 is a simulation game for lovers of interior design, home renovation and decoration. In this game you can show off your design talents by transforming old and dilapidated houses into cozy and stylish homes.

Game graphics:
House Designer 2 is powered by a new game engine that supports ray tracing, which delivers stunning graphics and realistic renderings. Thanks to this, you can enjoy the game with incredible detail and depth, creating beautiful and functional interiors.

Tasks:
House Designer 2 has many interesting mechanics and tasks that will help you develop your design skills. Choose from a variety of styles and trends, use a variety of materials and decorative items to create the home of your dreams.

Houses in the game:
The game has many houses in different styles, ranging from classic to modern. You can choose a house that suits your preferences and turn it into a cozy home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 or similar from AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i7 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 or similar from AMD
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: House Designer 2 is the perfect choice for those who want to test their design skills and create their dream home. With great graphics and ray tracing, tons of mechanics and challenges, and the ability to work on different styles of houses, the game is sure to keep you busy for hours.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Czech, Japanese
